routing.community

Interface CommunityDetection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KCliqueCommunityDetection, ModularityCommunityDetection, SimpleCommunityDetection

    public interface CommunityDetection

    An abstraction of community detection algorithms that track and assemble a set of nodes defined to the local community of this object. Each of the algorithms must update their information whenever a new connection is formed or one is lost, and they are responsible for determining if a given host is a member of the community or not.

    These algorithms are needed by social-based routing protocols, such as DistributedBubbleRap and LABELDecisionEngine to determine appropriate forwarding paths based on community membership.

    • Method Detail

      • newConnection

        void newConnection(DTNHost myHost,
                   DTNHost peer,
                   CommunityDetection peerCD)
        Called to inform the object that a new connection was made.
        Parameters:
        myHost - Host to which this CommunityDetection object belongs
        peer - Host that connected to this host
        peerCD - Instance of CommunityDetection residing at the new peer

      • connectionLost

        void connectionLost(DTNHost myHost,
                    DTNHost peer,
                    CommunityDetection peerCD,
                    java.util.List<Duration> connHistory)
        Called to inform the object that a connection was lost.
        Parameters:
        myHost - Host to which this CommunityDetection object belongs
        peer - Host that is now disconnected from this object
        peerCD - Instance of CommunityDetection residing at the lost peer
        connHistory - Entire connection history between this host and the peer

      • isHostInCommunity

        boolean isHostInCommunity(DTNHost h)
        Determines if the given host is a member of the local community of this object.
        Parameters:
        h - Host to consider
        Returns:
        true if h is a member of the community, false otherwise

      • getLocalCommunity

        java.util.Set<DTNHost> getLocalCommunity()
        Returns a set of hosts that are members of the local community of this object. This method is really only provided for CommunityDetectionReport to use.
        Returns:
        the Set representation of the local community

      • replicate

        CommunityDetection replicate()
        Duplicates this CommunityDetection object.
        Returns:
        A semantically equal copy of this CommunityDetection object
